column4: ive just updated to ubuntu 9.10, and my sound card (VIA VT1708) dont work. Ive googled some hours and every web page says that it was a problem related to an ALSA option: Independent HP. Ive switched but it doesnt work anyway.... any idea?
does anybody got that VIA V1708 working? it worked with Hardy and Jaunty...
can someone answer my question or at least give me a point of referene?
